mapper.insert: insert into edu_schoolclasscurriculum (pkid, schoolid, classid, week, session, teacherid, subjectid) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{schoolid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{week,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{session,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teacherid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subjectid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update edu_schoolclasscurriculum set schoolid = #{schoolid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, classid = #{classid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, week = #{week,jdbcType=INTEGER}, session = #{session,jdbcType=INTEGER}, teacherid = #{teacherid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, subjectid = #{subjectid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, schoolid, classid, week, session, teacherid, subjectid from edu_schoolclasscurriculum
select pkid, schoolid, classid, week, session, teacherid, subjectid from edu_schoolclasscurriculum WHERE schoolid=#{0} and classid=#{1} and week=#{2} and session=#{3} limit 1
